studyprogress
Class ModelCourseListener

java.lang.Object
  studyprogress.ModelCourseListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class ModelCourseListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

Button listener class for the graphical model Course creation screen.

checkData

public boolean checkData(java.lang.String yearstring,
                         java.lang.String gradestring,
                         java.lang.String semesterstring)
Helper method for checking user input Course data.

Parameters:
yearstring - The year input by user.
gradestring - The grade input by user.
semesterstring - The semester input by user using the semester button group.
Returns:
True if data follows the rules for a Course, otherwise false.
